title: Dinner with Engelbart
html:
Five years ago I had dinner with Doug Engelbart.

Source: Scripting News: 10/6/2005

Color me envious. I'm not sure what I'd have to say to the man that'd come off as intelligent, but I'd love to pick his brain about the mouse and human augmentation.
body:
Five years ago I had dinner with Doug Engelbart.
Source: Scripting News: 10/6/2005
Color *me* envious. I'm not sure what *I'd* have to say to the man that'd come off as intelligent, but I'd love to pick his brain about [the mouse](http://sloan.stanford.edu/MouseSite/1968Demo.html) and [human augmentation](http://sloan.stanford.edu/mousesite/EngelbartPapers/B5_F18_ConceptFrameworkInd.html).
